item.title: Yamaha DX7 Technical Analysis
item.description: An introductory technical analysis of the Yamaha DX7, detailing some of the known information about the synthesiserâ€™s engineering.

item.title: Giving Ada a Chance
item.description: An in-depth look at the Ada programming language, its history, and what it has to offer developers today. As well as a fistful of my humble opinions.

item.title: Korg Volca FM Review
item.description: A review of KORG's modern FM module, in which we discover how embarrassingly little research I put into my equipment purchases.

item.title: Casio CZ-101 Review
item.description: A review of the Casio CZ-101 synthesizer, from the charitable perspective of someone with experience in ugly, digital noise: An industrial musician.
